description: The 26-year-old former escort finally makes her Ex On The Beach debut, emerging from the sea on next on next Tuesday's upcoming episode of the MTV reality show.
title: Jenny Thompson makes Ex On The Beach debut in a bikini
title_page: Jenny Thompson makes Ex On The Beach debut in a bikini | Daily Mail Online
text:
She's been teasing her Ex On The Beach debut for weeks.
And it's not long before JeThe 26-year-old former escort, famed for sleeping with Wayne Rooney, stuns in a lime green bikini with a black lace trim as she has her Baywatch moment.
Waiting anxiously to see whose ex is next to emerge from the sea were Aaron, Harriette and Josh.
Scroll down for video
Beach babe: Jenny Thompson finally makes her Ex On The Beach debut, emerging from the sea on next on next Tuesday's upcoming episode of the MTV reality show
To Josh’s surprise, it’s his ex Jenny, and the hunk is relieved, as there is no animosity between the two.
He revealed: 'It could have been ten times worse'.
As Jenny is welcomed to the beach, the Tablet of Terror chimes again and sends Aaron and Jenny on a beer pong date.
Cheeky kiss: It's not long before Jenny makes a move on Geordie Shore hunk Aaron
Loving the limelight: The former escort looked like she enjoyed every moment as she emerged from the sea
During their date, both Aaron and Jenny confirm they’re single and have no loyalties to either Josh or Becca - it seems they’re both interested in each other.
After a little flirting, the two end the date with a cheeky kiss before heading back to the villa.
Following several explosive fights, Aaron decides to head up to the penthouse. He takes Jenny with him and the two enjoy spending the night together.
On good terms: To Josh’s surprise, it’s his ex Jenny, and the hunk is relieved, as there is no animosity between the two
Making an impression: Jenny stuns in a lime green bikini with a black lace trim as she has her Baywatch moment
Their liaison comes as little surprise since it was reported last autumn the brunette had shared a steamy romp with Aaron.
An insider told The Sun: 'Jenny T had her eyes on Aaron from the start, he’s completely her type and she made a beeline for him right away.
'It wasn’t long before she’d got her wicked way with him and they were in bed with each other, things got pretty heated pretty fast.'
Jenny enters the villa 14 March at 10pm, only on MTV.
Chemistry: Their liaison comes as little surprise since it was reported last autumn the brunette had shared a steamy romp with Aaron
